VALID_DEBUG_COUNTERS.desc: One debug counter of each valid type

VALID_COUNTERS_WITH_DROP_REASONS.desc: Multiple counters with drop reasons added

INVALID_DEBUG_COUNTER_TYPE.desc: One debug counter with invalid type

DEBUG_COUNTER_MISSING_COUNTER_TYPE.desc: One debug counter with missing type

NONEXIST_DEBUG_COUNTER_FOR_DROP_REASON.desc: Add a drop reason for a non-existent counter
NONEXIST_DEBUG_COUNTER_FOR_DROP_REASON.eStr: The counter does not exist in the DEBUG_COUNTER table

INVALID_DROP_REASON.desc: Add an invalid drop reason to a counter

NONEXIST_DEBUG_COUNTER_FOR_DROP_MONITOR_.desc: Add a drop monitor stats for a non-existent counter
NONEXIST_DEBUG_COUNTER_FOR_DROP_MONITOR_.eStr: The counter does not exist in the DEBUG_COUNTER table

INVALID_PERSISTENT_DROP_ALERTS.desc: Add a persistent alert for a non-existent counter
INVALID_PERSISTENT_DROP_ALERTS.eStr: The counter does not exist in the DEBUG_COUNTER table
